title: General Knowledge Quiz
description: Test your knowledge across multiple topics

questions.question: Which of the following is the correct format specifier for long int in C?
What is the output of sizeof(char) in C?
Which header file is required for using printf() and scanf() in C?
Which of the following is not a valid C variable name?
What will 5/2 evaluate to in C?
Which of the following is a storage class in C?
Which operator is used to get the memory address of a variable?
Which of the following loops will always execute at least once?
What is the default return type of a function in C, if not specified?
Which keyword is used to prevent modification of a variable in C?
What will printf("%d", 10==10); output?
Which of the following is used to define a constant in C?
What is the size of int in most 32-bit compilers?
Which function is used to allocate memory dynamically in C?
Which function is used to compare two strings in C?
Which of the following is the brain of the computer?
Which type of memory is non-volatile?
Which of the following is an example of secondary storage?
Which of the following is not an input device?
Which of the following is a system software?
Which logic gate gives output 1 if at least one input is 1?
What does BIOS stand for?
The smallest unit of data in computer is:
Which number system is used by computers internally?
Which among the following is a volatile memory?
Which device converts digital signals into analog signals?
Which generation of computers used Integrated Circuits (ICs)?
Which type of software controls the overall functioning of the computer?
Which unit performs all arithmetic and logical operations in a computer?
What is the full form of URL?
What is the name of the support package worth ₹25,000 crore unveiled by the Indian government to boost exporters?
Which ambitious infrastructure project did PM Modi announce, saying “the day is not far” for India’s presence in orbit?
India cleared a ₹70,000 crore deal under Project 75 to build how many submarines with German assistance?
India’s Finance Ministry has said the country needs to sustain an average GDP growth rate of what percent over the next decade to meet its 2047 developed nation goal?
India will begin its first digital census in how many years, including caste details for the first time since 1951?
Which state will host a host of global sporting events starting in 2025 to strengthen its bid for the 2036 Olympics?
What has Ukraine announced could be ready as early as next week amid talks on security assurances?
Which major reform did UK Chancellor Rachel Reeves suggest might be considered in an upcoming budget?
What global crisis did UN agencies warn is putting workers at heightened risk?
At the ET World Leaders Forum, EAM S. Jaishankar defended India’s trade policy in response to criticism over … what?
Which Indian actor is often credited with bringing realism to Indian parallel cinema and starred in “Ankur” (1974)?
Which 2025 Indian film won the best feature film award at a major international festival?
Which legendary Indian cricketer announced his retirement from all forms of cricket on August 24, 2025?
Which groundbreaking sports governance legislation was passed by Lok Sabha to improve transparency?
Which major archery title did India’s U-21 compound men’s team win for the first time in 2025?
Which football tournament did NorthEast United win in 2025?
India won all gold medals in which event at the 16th Asian Shooting Championship in Shymkent?
What was the outcome of the inaugural Rugby Premier League in 2025?
Which high-profile WWE star hinted at a parallel to Lionel Messi regarding retirement?
Which two countries withdrew from the Hockey Asia Cup citing security concerns before being replaced by Bangladesh and Kazakhstan?
